title: XMEME
author: XMEME
content: XMEME Project is an innovative ETF based on meme coins. The project construction started a year ago when we were contemplating how to hunt the best meme project. Its primary objective is to facilitate people's entry into the world of meme coins, eliminating the need for constantly hunting for these popular cryptocurrencies. With XMEME, investors can diversify their cryptocurrency portfolios by investing in a basket of different meme coins using a single tool, making investments more accessible and diversified. It's the perfect solution for those who want to explore this dynamic market while prioritizing convenience and efficiency.To kickstart our initial promotion, we partnered with AlphaGuilty, and now we're transitioning into the main airdrop phase, which is the second of three stops in the first stage of our promotion.WebApp: https://xmeme.ioWhitepaper: https://github.com/XMEMEio/WhitepaperRoadmap: https://github.com/XMEMEio/RoadmapTelegram: https://t.me/Xmeme_ioX: https://x.com/XmemeCommunityCurrent Airdrop Actions on Fair-Crypto Rules: Primary: https://t.me/xmeme_airdrop_botSecondary: https://alphaguilty.io/quest/xmeme-meme-coins-etfYOU CAN JOIN BOTH!If you have any questions or doubts, we will be happy to answer them
